v8:item.v8:content: Grupo de las configuraciones del usuario
Внешние пользователи список контекстное меню стандартные команды
External user list context menu standard commands
Standardowe polecenia menu kontekstowego listy użytkowników zewnętrznych
Utilizatori externi listă meniu de context comenzi standard
Dış kullanıcılar içerik menüsü standart komutlar listesi
Usuarios externos lista menú contextual comandos estándares
Show external users that belong to subgroups
Afișați utilizatorii externi care aparțin unor subgrupe
Mostrar los usuarios externos de los grupos subordinados

Settings.QueryText: SELECT ExternalUsers.Ref, ExternalUsers.Prepared, ExternalUsers.DeletionMark, ExternalUsers.Invalid, ExternalUsers.Predefined, ExternalUsers.Description, ExternalUsers.Comment, VALUETYPE(ExternalUsers.Ref.AuthorizationObject) AS AuthorizationObjectType, CASE WHEN ExternalUsers.DeletionMark THEN 6 ELSE 7 END AS PictureNumber, CASE WHEN ExternalUsers.Invalid THEN FALSE WHEN ExternalUsers.IBUserID = &CurrentIBUserID THEN TRUE WHEN &CanChangeOwnPasswordOnly THEN FALSE WHEN ExternalUsers.IBUserID = &BlankUUID THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END AS CanChangePassword, ExternalUsers.IBUserID FROM Catalog.ExternalUsers AS ExternalUsers WHERE CASE WHEN &AllExternalUsers THEN TRUE WHEN &SelectHierarchy THEN TRUE IN (SELECT TRUE FROM InformationRegister.UserGroupCompositions AS UserGroupCompositions WHERE UserGroupCompositions.User = ExternalUsers.Ref AND UserGroupCompositions.UsersGroup = &ExternalUsersGroup) ELSE TRUE IN (SELECT TRUE FROM Catalog.ExternalUsersGroups.Content AS ExternalUsersGroupsComposition WHERE ExternalUsersGroupsComposition.ExternalUser = ExternalUsers.Ref AND ExternalUsersGroupsComposition.Ref = &ExternalUsersGroup) END

SELECT ExternalUsersGroups.Ref, ExternalUsersGroups.DeletionMark, ExternalUsersGroups.Predefined, ExternalUsersGroups.Parent, ExternalUsersGroups.Description, CASE WHEN ExternalUsersGroups.DeletionMark THEN 8 ELSE 9 END AS PictureNumber, ExternalUsersGroups.AllAuthorizationObjects, ExternalUsersGroups.Comment FROM Catalog.ExternalUsersGroups AS ExternalUsersGroups

v8:item.v8:content: Show users that belong to subgroups
Creați un grup de utilizatori externi
Crear un grupo de usuario externo
Creați un grup de utilizatori externi
Crear un grupo de usuario externo
Kullanıcı veya grup seçimini iptal et
Cancelar un usuario o un grupo de selección
Очистить список выбранных пользователей и групп
Wyczyść listę wybranych użytkowników i grup
Liste der ausgewählten Benutzer und Gruppen löschen
Seçilen kullanıcıların ve grupların listesini temizle
Borrar la lista de los usuarios y grupos seleccionados
